text.div: • Include codes from http://terminology.hl7.org/CodeSystem/v3-ActRelationshipType where concept is-a GEN

name: ActRelationshipHasGeneralization
title: ActRelationshipHasGeneralization
description: The generalization relationship can be used to express categorical knowledge about services (e.g., amilorid, triamterene, and spironolactone have the common generalization potassium sparing diuretic).
